attributes.comment:
Hi,
I would like to let you know that I strongly oppose the increased fees for filing
which are being proposed, particularly those impacting adopting parents. Due to
many events, I will already need to file the necessary documents twice in order
to 'stay active' because of the inordinate amount of time that referrals have
increased in the past several months. These fees are outrageously expensive and
it would be greatly appreciated if you would take into consideration people who
have to file over and over simply due to extended wait times.
Thank you,
Valerie
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Valerie Whiteside
